/usr/lib/ccache/c++  -fPIC  -Wno-write-strings -Wno-format-security -O3 -DNDEBUG   -shared -Wl,-soname,libdjvPngPlugin.so -o ../../build/lib/libdjvPngPlugin.so CMakeFiles/djvPngPlugin.dir/djvPngLoad.cpp.o CMakeFiles/djvPngPlugin.dir/djvPngPlugin.cpp.o CMakeFiles/djvPngPlugin.dir/djvPngSave.cpp.o -lpng -lz -lz ../../build/lib/libdjvGui.so ../../build/lib/libdjvCore.so /usr/lib/libQt5Widgets.so.5.4.1 /usr/lib/libQt5OpenGL.so.5.4.1 /usr/lib/libQt5Core.so.5.4.1 -lIex -lHalf -lImath -lIlmThread -lGLEW -lGLU -lGL -lSM -lICE -lX11 -lXext -ldl /usr/lib/libQt5Widgets.so.5.4.1 /usr/lib/libQt5Gui.so.5.4.1 /usr/lib/libQt5Core.so.5.4.1 -Wl,-rpath,/home/lince/djv-git/build/lib:
